Class Unsubscribed

java.lang.Object
dryclean.cyprusDryCleanEntities.User
dryclean.cyprusDryCleanEntities.Customer
dryclean.cyprusDryCleanEntities.Unsubscribed
All Implemented Interfaces:
customerManagement, Comparable<Customer>
public class Unsubscribed extends Customer
Represents an unsubscribed customer in the system. Unsubscribed customers do not have a subscription but may receive loyalty-based discounts. Extends the Customer class.
Version:
23.0
Author:
Ferhat Kasim Koc

  • Method Details

    • displayCustomerDetails

      public void displayCustomerDetails()
      Displays the details of the unsubscribed customer, including loyalty status. Indicates the customer's total number of orders.
      Specified by:
      displayCustomerDetails in class Customer

    • calculateDiscount

      public double calculateDiscount()
      Calculates the discount for the unsubscribed customer based on loyalty. Unsubscribed customers receive a 5% discount if they have been customers for 10 or more years.
      Returns:
      The discount rate as a percentage

    • calculateTotalOrderIncome

      public double calculateTotalOrderIncome()
      Calculates the total income generated by the customer's orders, ignoring any discounts.
      Returns:
      The total income without discounts applied.
